member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Append a newline character to the string builder.
member.returns: The current IndentedStringBuilder instance to support method chaining.

member.summary: Conditionally append a line of content to the string builder.

The string to append when condition is false (optional).

member.summary: Decrease the indentation level, subsequent content will use shallower indentation.
